original_text:
From the descendants of Issachar:
All the men twenty years old or more who were able to serve in the army were listed by name, according to the records of their clans and families.
korean_text: 잇사갈의 아들들에게서 난 자를 그들의 종족과 조상의 가문에 따라 이십 세 이상으로 싸움에 나갈 만한 자를 그 명수대로 다 계수하니

sentences.original_text: All the men twenty years old or more
sentences.korean_translation: 스무 살 이상 된 모든 남자는

sentences.original_text: who were able to serve in the army
according to the records of their clans and families.
